doc:lib.member.doc:lib.name: Syntelos.SVG.viewbox
doc:lib.member.doc:desc: Normal script interface to viewbox integer values.

doc:param.doc:desc: An 'svg:svg' element or which may have an attribute named 'viewBox', or may have a containing 'svg:svg' element with a view box.

doc:return.doc:desc: Null or an array of four viewbox float values.
